Control Name: 2.16.9 Operational procedures are defined in case data sizes exceed limits.
Control Statement: Mitigation plans such as purging or archiving data can help the application to remain available in scenarios where data size exceeds expected limits.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.16 What operational excellence allowances for reliability have you made?
